Do not fear. Calm your heart and face north. Knock your left teeth thirty-six times in succession and secretly intone:

*"Heavenly cautery, heavenly cautery,
abode of the Celestial Court,
unbound by Northern Feng,
toying with my celestial writ—
three paths let loose, six evils seize the void.
I have reported to the Northern Emperor,
to gather and suppress ghostly schemes.
Radiant fall the streaming bells,
jade-sealed celestial talismans.
Divine perfected ones exact their judgment,
eradicating all without remainder.
Swift as my fate commands,
no delay, no lingering."*

Cease, then with both hands pinch the gates behind your ears, drawing in qi thirty-six times to conclude.

When thus entering mountains or engaging in cultivation, all heavenly demons and mountain spirits shall be annihilated beneath the might of this oral incantation, never again to test or disturb you. The perfected immortal officials will naturally descend, and within no more than a year, you shall attain immortality.

If you see an old woman wearing a white turban, draped in a yellow mantle and purple skirt, this is the Yin Official of Northern Feng, the marshal of the Great Demon. If you see a maiden of twenty or so, her hair bound in a three-cornered topknot, clad in five-colored robes, holding a golden halberd, this is the daughter of the Lord of Northern Feng’s capital—both come to test your authenticity.

Knock your teeth thirty-two times in succession and secretly intone:

*"Flying Sovereign, Yin’s encircling,
born of the Six Heavens,
transforming qi to bear numinous power,
your lifespan governed by a century’s reckoning.
Three generations shift in turn,
all pure and bright ascend—
why alone do you linger,
mired in the mortal world?
Yesterday, by imperial command,
you were sent to inspect and delay.
Depart swiftly without lingering,
that you may briefly extend your stay.
Report separately to Northern Feng,
to restrain and dispatch your demonic form."*

Cease, then with both hands swiftly pinch the gates behind your ears, drawing in qi thirty-six times to conclude.

Practicing the Dao thus in pursuit of immortality, the myriad demons shall be vanquished in trial, celestial essences shattered and dispersed, and the Dao shall naturally come to fruition. Within a hundred days, heavenly perfected ones will descend, conversing with your spirit. Such visions may come while meditating with eyes closed, or after a hundred days of facing them as before, or even in dreams during sleep. Without steadfast resolve, one will not perceive the true and be moved to see them.

Once the great method is faintly grasped, within nine years, none shall fail to behold the perfected divine spirits. Upon seeing the true and perfected, one shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

Disciples who meditate with eyes closed, knock their teeth, and visualize spirit and qi, yet remain unaware of the luminous forms and appearances—both true and false—labor in vain, their toil unanswered, never moved to perceive the true. Seeing the true yet failing to summon the spirits, or seeing the false yet failing to vanquish the demons—how then shall the true descend, or the demons perish?

As the Queen Mother possesses the *Western Tortoise Record*, which depicts the forms of the ten thousand spirits and the radiance of the ten thousand perfected, those who study yet fail to see this—how can they hope to succeed? For those who practice visualization to summon spirits without the method of penetrating insight, even the highest perfected ones cannot be readily attained. Only those whose sincerity moves the depths shall be met by the officials of illusory reflection, who open the fordways of their passage—this is the means to perfect attainment.

If the body bears defilement or impurities, or if one’s cultivation of qi remains incomplete, heavenly demons and mountain spirits will invariably test and thwart them first. Facing such trials yet unaware of the incantations to vanquish them, immortality shall never be achieved. With these incantations, practiced within a hundred days, no demon shall remain, and no true spirit shall fail to descend.

This is the subtle and wondrous Dao, not to be expounded in written discourse. To recklessly divulge these words invites judgment upon one’s parents, ancestors, and the very roots of their lineage. Guard this secret with utmost care, and the Dao shall perfect your body.

**Three Primordials Jade-Tablet Memorial and Petition Rite**

Arrange a platter of incense, vegetables, cakes, and fruit, along with nine measures of pure oil set in nine lamps. Prepare a seat facing north, place the text at its center upon a crimson silk cloth, and write three bamboo slips to be laid beneath the incense and offerings.

The recipient shall face north, knock their teeth thirty-six times in succession, and softly intone:

*"Supreme numen of the August Heaven,
formless in primordial chaos,
thirty-nine emperors,
Five Elders of Highest Clarity—
on this auspicious dawn,
celestial immortals scatter their essence.
Eight luminaries wander,
Three Primordials hasten with jade.
Flowing perfection descends,
gazing upon the empty courtyard.
Your servant, so-and-so,
dares to address the Great Numen:
once, by imperial command,
I received the precious scripture,
jade tablets of hidden writ,
the Three Primordials’ inner names.
Meditating in seclusion, yearning for the divine,
I have yet to behold their true forms.
I now ascend the lofty marchmount,
arraying my memorial in cinnabar and azure.
I cast my petition into the hidden mountains,
burning incense in the eight darknesses.
The Four Controllers and Five Emperors,
witness my utmost sincerity.
Present my bamboo slips,
that they ascend to Highest Clarity.
May the perfected spirits descend,
flying into the imperial court."*

Conclude by burning one silk text and one bamboo slip at the altar until consumed. Mix nine kinds of incense with the oil and pour it over the flames.

The Twofold Petition to the Three Primordials: An Upper Method

This method is for beginners who have not yet received the descent of the celestial perfected. Perform it once yearly, and the celestial perfected shall unfailingly descend to your chamber. If you perceive even faint traces or glimpse the divine presence, you shall ascend within the year, and need not petition again or sacrifice to the celestial spirits.

Without this method, the Dao cannot be accomplished, nor can the spirits descend. This is the foundation of all practice. [Your name], Master of [Your Sacred Peak], styled [Your courtesy name], aged [Your age] years, born in the [Your birth month], respectfully receives the celestial writ of the Upper Primordial. [Your name], Master of [Your Sacred Peak], styled [Your courtesy name], aged [Your age] years, born in the [Your birth month], respectfully receives the immortal writ of the Middle Primordial. I humbly beseech the descent of the celestial perfected, that I may soar through the Upper Clarity, attend the Middle Primordial, and swiftly attain divine transcendence.

Petitioned on the [Day] of the [Month] in the [Year], at the hour of [Time].

**To the Purple Void, Jade Clarity, Mysterious Primordial, Lofty Emperor, White Simplicity, Lower Primordial Great Perfected:**

[Your name], Master of [Your Sacred Peak], styled [Your courtesy name], aged [Your age] years, born in the [Your birth month], respectfully receives the terrestrial writ of the Lower Primordial. I humbly beseech the descent of the celestial perfected, that I may soar through the Upper Clarity, attend the Lower Primordial, and swiftly attain divine transcendence.

Petitioned on the [Day] of the [Month] in the [Year], at the hour of [Time].

Inscribe this in white ink upon a silver tablet, one foot and two inches in length. Bury it on the northern slope of a mountain, three feet deep.

The Three Primordial Jade Tablets are the most sacred writ of the celestial perfected. They form the foundation of transcendence practice. Perform this rite for a hundred days, and the divine forms shall manifest. No prayer shall go unanswered, no thought unfulfilled, no aspiration unaccomplished. Those who obtain this method shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

If silver is unavailable, use jade; if jade is unavailable, silverwood may suffice. Ensure the tablet is wrapped in pure white cloth, free of any impurity, before use.

Long ago, Ning Xuanfu received this method from the August Supreme Perfected. Nine years after his ascension failed, he buried the tablets on White Hollow Mountain, nine feet deep. Later, the disciple Li Zhongjun passed by the chamber of White Hollow Mountain. After a hundred days of fasting and devotion, he suddenly beheld a silver tablet inscribed with jade script within the cavern. After three years of kneeling devotion, the Three Primordials descended, extending his lifespan by seven hundred years. He then journeyed to Lao Valley Master, received the true writ, and ascended to heaven.

A copy of this writ remains sealed on White Hollow Mountain.

The Primordial Sovereign, in the celestial wilds of Golden Mound, bestowed this upon the Azure Void Perfected, Master Wang, to teach those whose bone destiny aligns with transcendence. Those who obtain this method shall attain transcendence without study.

**The Upper Method for Internal Cultivation of the Three Primordials: Summoning the Perfected and Inviting the Divine**

The Three Primordial Sovereigns of Grand Simplicity dwell in the Highest Upper Clarity Palace, within the Hall of Vast Spirit. The morning lamps illuminate the Jade Perfected; radiant light shines within the Cinnabar Chamber. chunks.original_text: 太素三元君，乃一真之女子，则三素元君之母也。 太素元君，虚结空胎，凭华而生，诞於高上上清宝素九玄玉皇天中。 厥讳正荟条，字云淳婴，头建宝琅扶晨羽冠，服紫炁浮云锦帔，着九色龙锦羽裙，腰带流金火铃虎符龙书，坐於太空之中，膝下常有丹绿青三素之云，云炁冠覆元君之身。 夫欲行飞仙之道，佩三元玉检之文，当以夜半时，於密室之中，北向瞑目，叩齿三通，存思太素三元君服色讳字，乘丹绿青三素飙轮，从玉皇天中来下，入降室内，便心拜於元君，微祝曰： 三气元精，九天上灵，晨晖朗曜，玉华洞明，三素飞飙，丹辕绿軿，八风 扬轮，流映霄庭，招真致仙，下降我形，上愿利亨，触向皆成，金颜华容，内府鲜明，八景扶舆，骨飞肉轻，上升丹台，朝谒玉清。 毕，咽气二十四通止。 开目，便讽玉清上宫琼瑶萧条之唱，以和於形魂之气，欣於太素之高真。 唱曰： 太元连玉清，三曜洞高明。 八景回晨风，散云蔼飞灵。 圆轮掷空洞，金映冠天精。 玉华结五老，紫烟运霄轮。 乘气荡玄房，委顺拔所经。 金姿曜九霞，玉质耀寒庭。 幽童回孩眄，老艾还反婴。 帝一固泥丸，九真保黄宁。 视眄万劫外，齐此九天倾。 毕，心拜，咽液三过，都止也。 太素元君长女，曰紫素元君，即无英君之母也。 紫素元君，托琼胎於紫胞，含虚秀於玉户，结灵胤而体真，凝神挺於自然。 厥讳翳郁炁刃，字安来上，头建太真晨婴之冠，三角髻，余发散之随腰，上着紫锦祫，下着飞霜罗裙，又带灵飞之绶，坐於太空之上，常有紫炁之云，冠覆於元君之形。 夫行飞仙之道二，佩三元玉检之文，当以夜半时，於密室之中，北向瞑目，叩齿三通，存思紫素元君服色讳字，乘紫云三素飞轮，从上清来下，入兆洞房宫左。 便心拜於紫素元君，微祝曰： 三元高灵，紫素云輧，策空蹑虚，徘徊霄庭，流真下眄，骋盖华精，三关安镇，洞房朗明，骨化肉升，内外飞轻，东华刻简，皇老记名，三真降布，我道长生，上享元吉，靡有不成，得乘飞景，上升玉清。 毕，咽气二十四过，开目，更讽玉清上宫琼瑶萧条之唱。 其辞曰： 玄空洞元素，三丹理明机。 飞霄蔚紫清，焕落九天扉。 自我御灵运，倏钦三阙开。 手把天地户，足践五岭梯。 顾看群方内，时有应我怀。 悟见本非运，遂使高真回。 同倾天地劫，相与腾虚飞。 毕，心拜，咽液三过，都止。 黄素元君，即太素之中女，中央黄老君之母也。 黄素元君，阙讳圆华黄刃，字太张上，头建太真晨婴之冠，三角髻，余发散之随腰，上着黄锦祫，下着五色飞青锦裙，佩凤文琳华之绶，腰带流黄挥精之剑，坐於玄虚之上，常有黄云之气，冠覆於元君之身也。 夫行飞仙之道，佩三元玉检之文，当以夜半时，於密室之中，北向瞑目，叩齿三通，存思黄素元君服色讳字，乘三素飞轮，从上清来下，入兆洞房宫中。 便心拜於黄素元君，微祝曰： 三气上真，高灵元神，流景霄房，出入华晨，回真下降，洞明我神，通玄彻微，招灵致仙，检御四运，回劫停年，反老华颜，金容内仙，奉侍三元，上登紫轩。 毕，咽气二十四过，开目，便讽玉清上宫琼瑶萧条之唱。 其辞曰： 飞霄蔼玄峙，云纲网天罗。

The Three Primordial Lords of Grand Simplicity are the maiden of singular perfection, mothers of the Three Primordial Ladies of Simplicity. The Primordial Lady of Grand Simplicity coalesced in an empty womb, born of blossoming radiance, delivered in the Highest Upper Clarity’s Jeweled Simplicity of the Nine Mysteries Jade Sovereign Heaven. Then, with the heart, bow to the Primordial Lady and softly invoke:

Triune qi, primordial essence,
Nine Heavens’ supreme numen,
dawn’s radiance gleams in clarity,
jade blossoms illumine the cave.
Three Simplicities’ flying whirlwind,
cinnabar shafts and green chariots,
Eight Winds raise the wheels,
flowing reflections brighten the Empyrean court.
Summon the perfected, induce transcendence,
descend into my form.
May all aspirations prosper,
every intent achieve fulfillment.
Golden countenance, blossoming visage,
inner treasury resplendent.
Eight Effulgences bear the palanquin,
bones take flight, flesh grows light.
Ascend the cinnabar terrace,
pay homage in Jade Clarity.

Conclude, then swallow qi twenty-four times and cease. Open the eyes and recite the Jade Clarity Upper Palace’s *Lonesome Chant of Jeweled Jade*, harmonizing with the qi of form and soul, rejoicing in the Grand Simplicity’s exalted perfected. The chant:

Grand Primordial links Jade Clarity,
Three Luminaries illumine the heights.
Eight Effulgences turn the dawn wind,
scattering clouds, misty flying numina.
Round wheels cast into the empty vast,
golden reflections crown Heaven’s essence.
Jade blossoms bind the Five Elders,
purple mists wheel the Empyrean chariot.
Riding qi, sway the mysterious chamber,

Golden visage gleams with ninefold auroras,

Secluded youths turn childlike glances,
aged elders revert to infancy.
The Celestial One solidifies the mud-pill,
Nine Perfected guard Yellow Tranquility.
Gaze beyond ten thousand kalpas,
equal this Nine Heavens’ inclination.

Then, with the heart, bow to the Primordial Lady of Purple Simplicity and softly invoke:

Triune Primordials’ exalted numina,
Purple Simplicity’s cloud chariot,
strategize the void, tread emptiness,
wander the Empyrean court.
Flowing perfected descend in gaze,
gallop the canopy’s blossoming essence.
Three Passes securely settled,
cave chamber illumined in clarity.
Bones transform, flesh ascends,
inner and outer take flight in lightness.
Eastern Blossom inscribes the tally,
August Elders record the name.
Three Perfected descend and bestow,
my Dao attains long life.
Ascend to enjoy primordial felicity,
nothing fails to achieve fruition.
Attain to ride the flying effulgence,
ascend to Jade Clarity.

Mysterious emptiness penetrates primordial simplicity,
Three Cinnabars govern the luminous mechanism.
Flying Empyrean luxuriates in Purple Clarity,

I ride the numinous movement,
suddenly revering the Three Gates’ opening.
Hands grasp the Heaven-Earth portal,
feet tread the Five Peaks’ ladder.
Gazing within the myriad regions,
occasionally answering my heart’s intent.
Awakening to see the origin beyond movement,
thus the exalted perfected return.
Together incline the Heaven-Earth kalpa,
soaring the void in flight.

Conclude, then with the heart bow, swallow saliva thrice, and cease entirely.

Triune qi’s exalted perfected,

illuminating my spirit in clarity.
Penetrate the mysterious, pierce the subtle,

chunks.original_text: 清汉通灵韵，妙唱应节和。 自我厌息用，奚趣孰云多。 始悟三玄启，九度忽以蹉。 顾眄大象内，不觉当如何。 既无餐童术，烟气降玉霞。 自非乘春用，何能保阳柯。 毕，心拜，咽液三过，都止。 白素元君，即太素元君之少女，白元君之母也。 白素元君，厥讳启明萧刃，字金门上，头建太真晨婴之冠，三角髻，余发散之随腰，上着白锦光明袷，下着飞霜绿锦飞裙，佩六山火玉之佩，凤文琳华之绶，腰带日延耀辉之剑，坐於玄虚之上，常有白云之气，冠覆於元君之身也。 夫行飞仙之道，佩三元玉检之文，当以夜半时，於密室之中，北向瞑目，叩齿三通，存思白素元君服色讳字，乘白素飞轮，从上清来下，入兆洞房宫右。 便心拜於白素元君，微祝曰： 素灵洞虚，玄象启真，三合生一，上化自然，天华流眄，降神陶津，回灵曲映，洞曜我身，通明三关，炁布丹田，变化雌雄，合帝神尊，魂安魄宁，长保玉仙，腾景金台，朝礼三元，极灵天地，欢庆欣欣。 毕，咽气二十四过止，开目，更讽玉清上宫琼瑶萧条之唱。 其辞曰： 飙轮舞空洞，咏歌庆云际。 萧条朗高韵，散风和玉籁。 百奏生绝宇，飞烟骋六辔。 豁落遗万累，清衿无豪滞。 逸朗遨九野，极灵八圆外。 逍遥天地间，岂悟年与迈。 毕，心拜，咽液三过止。 玉清上宫琼瑶萧条之唱，乃有九十章。 三元君主之，元君恒咏其曲，以和於形魂之炁，庆於九府之真。 行三元之道，当讽诵其唱，求感於至灵，招於玄降之津路也。 修行此道，不过三年，存思三元，将有仿髴，必降兆形也。 得见三元，便寿万年。 高上以三元为洞根，太丹以三元为至精。 三元含真秀景，凭虚而生，处於高上上清宝素九玄玉皇天中，凝神太漠，恬真灵关，上总万司，普领群仙，检掌宝章，典於洞文； 中统图录，得道之名，生死简札，咸隶之焉； 下制五岳，山海河源，上治无上，下治洞房。 夫为学者，当咏妙唱於寂室，散玉音乎九空，则七祖受惠於高上，幽魂更生於胎仙，变元父於灵都，欢玄母於玉房，积感发乎精情，密思彻乎太空，披神颜於妙想，招灵降於自然。 三年克得朝礼於太素，睹真形於三元也。 太素三元君、三素元君隐名讳字，皆空虚自然之号，结紫虚之韵而生音焉。 有知白素元君之名，三年存思，克见白素元君真形； 见白素元君真形，则寿三千年。 有知黄素元君之名，三年存思，克见黄素元君真形； 见黄素元君真形，则寿万年。 有知紫素元君之名，三年存思，则见紫素元君真形； 得见紫素元君，财寿三万年。 有知太素三元君，寿与天地同久，存思则见太素三元君真形； 见太素三一元君，寿与天地相倾。 宝名至讳，高上所秘，有知之者，玄记书名，三元以上宫玉女十二人，侍卫其身。 轻告宣泄，七祖充责，己身亡命，三徒五苦，万劫不原。 三元隐朝内仙上法 凡受三元玉检，修行三元之道，当於密室朝太素三元君。 常以正月十日、二月九日、三月八日、四月七日、五月六日、六月五日、七月四日、八月三日、九月二日、十月十一日、十一月十二日、十二月十三日，夜半於寝静之室，烧香，北向心拜三过讫，坐卧任意，稽首心祝曰： 谨启太上大道、高虚玉晨、太素紫宫三元帝君、中央黄老、无英、白元、玉皇大帝、五老高真、太极皇精玄皇玉君，某甲是大洞三景弟子，谨以吉日之夜，天关九开之间，上闻太上太素三元、三素元君、玉皇真君前，乞得长生世上，寿元亿年，时乘黄晨绿盖龙辕，上诣紫庭，役使万神，侍卫四明太素帝君。

exquisite chant harmonizes with the rhythm.
Since I have wearied of mundane utility,
what pursuit could be deemed excessive?
Only then do I awaken to the Three Mysteries’ revelation,
the Nine Cycles suddenly slipping past.
Gazing within the great image,
unaware of what may come.
Lacking the art of the fasting youths,
misty qi descends as jade radiance.
Without harnessing spring’s power,
how can one preserve the yang branch?

Conclude, then bow in the heart, swallow saliva thrice, and cease.

The Primordial Lady of White Simplicity is the youngest daughter of the Primordial Lady of Supreme Simplicity and the mother of the White Primordial Lord. Her taboo name is *Qiming Xiaoren*, her style *Jinmen Shang*, her head crowned with the *Grand Perfected Dawn Infant’s* coronet, her triple-coiled chignon unbound, the rest of her hair cascading to her waist. She wears an upper garment of luminous white brocade and a lower skirt of flying-frost green brocade, girded with a pendant of *Six-Mountain Fire Jade* and a sash of *Phoenix-Writ Phoenix-Floret*, her waist bearing the *Sun-Extending Radiance* sword. Visualize the Primordial Lady of White Simplicity—her raiment, taboo name, and style—riding a white, simple flying wheel, descending from the Highest Clarity into the right chamber of one’s *Cavern Palace*. Then bow in the heart to the Primordial Lady of White Simplicity and softly invoke:

Primal numinous void,
mysterious image reveals the true.
Three unite as one,
ascending to transform spontaneously.
Heavenly blossoms stream their gaze,
descending spirits mold the elixir.
Curved reflections return the numinous,
illuminating my body in radiance.
Penetrate the Three Passes,
qi spreads through the cinnabar field.
Transform yin and yang,
unite with the imperial spirit’s honor.
Soul settled, spirit tranquil,
eternally preserve the jade transcendent.
Ascend the golden terrace’s effulgence,
pay homage to the Three Primordials.
Uttermost numinous heaven and earth,
rejoice in exultant bliss.

Conclude, then swallow qi twenty-four times and cease. Open the eyes and recite once more the Jade Clarity Upper Palace’s *Lonesome Chant of Jeweled Jade*. Its words:

Whirlwind wheels dance the hollow void,
chanting songs at the cloud’s edge.
Lonesome, bright, lofty resonance,
scattering winds harmonize with jade pipes.
A hundred strains arise in the remote realm,
flying mists gallop the six reins.
Vast and unbound, shedding myriad burdens,
pure lapels free of the slightest hindrance.
Unfettered, roam the nine wilds,
transcend the eight spheres’ bounds.
Carefree between heaven and earth,
how could one reckon years or age?

Conclude, then bow in the heart and swallow saliva thrice to cease.

The Jade Clarity Upper Palace’s *Lonesome Chant of Jeweled Jade* comprises ninety chapters. The Three Primordial Lords preside over it, and the Primordial Lords ever chant its verses to harmonize the qi of form and soul, to rejoice the perfected of the Nine Palaces. Practicing the Dao of the Three Primordials, one should recite this chant to seek resonance with the utmost numinous and summon the path of the descending mystic elixir. Cultivating this Dao for no more than three years, visualizing the Three Primordials, one will perceive their semblance, and they shall descend in your form. Upon beholding the Three Primordials, one attains longevity of ten thousand years.

The Highest regards the Three Primordials as the root of the cavern, the Great Elixir as the Three Primordials’ utmost essence. The Three Primordials, containing the true and flourishing effulgence, arise from the void, dwelling in the Highest Highest Clarity’s *Jeweled Simplicity Nine Mysteries Jade Emperor Heaven*, congealing spirit in the Great Vastness, tranquil in the numinous pass. Above, they govern ten thousand offices, universally leading the host of transcendents; they inspect and hold the precious scriptures, overseeing the cavern texts. At the center, they govern the registers, the names of those who attain the Dao, the ledgers of life and death, all subject to their charge. Below, they regulate the Five Peaks, the mountains and seas, the rivers and springs; above, they govern the Highest, below, the Cavern Palace.

For the practitioner, one should chant the exquisite verses in a silent chamber, scatter jade tones through the nine voids. Then the seven ancestors receive grace from the Highest, dark souls are reborn as womb transcendents, the primordial father transforms in the numinous capital, the mystic mother rejoices in the jade chamber. Accumulated resonance stirs in the essence of feeling, secret contemplation pierces the Great Void, the divine countenance is unveiled in wondrous vision, the numinous descends spontaneously. Within three years, one may attain audience with the Primordial of Supreme Simplicity and behold the true forms of the Three Primordials.

The Primordial Lords of Supreme Simplicity and the Three Primordials of Simplicity conceal their names and styles, all appellations of the empty void’s spontaneity, forming tones from the purple void’s resonance. Knowing the name of the Primordial Lady of White Simplicity and visualizing her for three years, one may behold her true form; seeing her true form, one attains longevity of three thousand years. Knowing the name of the Primordial Lady of Yellow Simplicity and visualizing her for three years, one may behold her true form; seeing her true form, one attains longevity of ten thousand years. Knowing the name of the Primordial Lady of Purple Simplicity and visualizing her for three years, one may behold her true form; upon beholding her, one attains wealth and longevity of thirty thousand years. Knowing the Primordial Lords of Supreme Simplicity, one’s longevity endures as long as heaven and earth; visualizing them, one beholds their true forms. Upon beholding the Primordial Lords of Supreme Unity, one’s longevity rivals heaven and earth.

The precious names and utmost taboos are secrets of the Highest. Those who know them inscribe their names in the mystic records, and twelve jade maidens of the Upper Palace of the Three Primordials attend and guard their persons. To lightly disclose or disseminate them invites the seven ancestors to bear the blame, one’s own life forfeit, subject to the three calamities, five sufferings, and ten thousand kalpas of irredeemable torment.

**The Hidden Audience of the Three Primordials: Inner Dao of the Upper Transcendents**

All who receive the *Three Primordials’ Jade Tallies* and cultivate the Dao of the Three Primordials must at dawn within a secluded chamber pay homage to the Primordial Lords of Supreme Simplicity. Regularly on the tenth day of the first month, the ninth day of the second month, the eighth day of the third month, the seventh day of the fourth month, the sixth day of the fifth month, the fifth day of the sixth month, the fourth day of the seventh month, the third day of the eighth month, the second day of the ninth month, the eleventh day of the tenth month, the twelfth day of the eleventh month, and the thirteenth day of the twelfth month, at midnight in a tranquil chamber, burn incense, face north, and bow in the heart thrice. Then, seated or reclining as one wishes, kowtow and invoke in the heart:

With reverence, I invoke the Supreme Great Dao, the High Void Jade Dawn, the Three Primordial Lords of the Supreme Simplicity Purple Palace, the Central Yellow Elder, the Peerless, the White Primordial, the Jade Emperor, the Five Elders of the Highest Perfected, the Jade Lord of the Mysterious Imperial Ultimate. I, so-and-so, am a disciple of the Three Effulgences of the Great Cavern. On this auspicious night, when the celestial passes open ninefold, I humbly announce before the Supreme Primordial Lords of Supreme Simplicity, the Three Primordial Ladies of Simplicity, and the True Lord Jade Emperor, beseeching longevity in the world, an age of a hundred million years, to ride the yellow dawn’s green-canopied dragon carriage, ascend to the Purple Court, command the myriad spirits, and attend the Four Luminants and the Primordial Lord of Supreme Simplicity.
